manage.hideDescription: Hide this place from the app and all public listings while keeping it accessible via direct link.
manage.confirmHideDescription: This place is hidden from the app and all public listings. It remains active through its direct link.
manage.notconfirmHideDescription: Hide this place from the app and all public listings. The place will remain active directly through its link.
manage.archiveDescription: Archive this place to disable checkout flow and remove it from public listings entirely.
manage.confirmArchiveDescription: This will disable the checkout flow and hide this place from all public listings.
manage.confirmDeleteDescription: Permanently delete this place. This cannot be reversed.
manage.deleteDescription: Permanently remove this place. This action cannot be undone and is only available if there are no associated orders.
